questions.quote: Ah, and I got a date with the sales woman. She's got a little Marisa Tomei thing going on.
No, but I can tell she's going to. I can sense it. We had this terrible phone conversation. I was so nervous before I called I made up this whole list of things to talk about.
Jerry, we got 'im. I'm riding his tail. There's no escape. He's running scared, buddy.
You mentioned George's name to Mayor Dinkins? You discussed George with the mayor of New York?
Well, I didn't really think about what I was gonna do with all..
Plus he probably doesn't even know how to program the buttons.
These are the people that want to talk to you. They got nothing else to do, why not disturb you?
Hey the woman got you a job. The least you could do is buy her a gift. How about this?
Yeah, dating a convicted felon. I don't know how you missed it.
Oh, man, it's spinach! I've been walking around like this all afternoon.
